secret.translate: тайный, секретный, потайной, скрытый, тайна, секрет, загадка
examples: The secret came out.
I'll find out your secret.
It's no longer a secret.
He blurted out the secret
She had a secret sorrow.
He left the secret untold.
Her secret was out.
Her secret died with her.
The mission is top secret.
My secret will die with me.
They arranged to meet in secret.
He made no secret of his designs.
Can I trust you to keep a secret?
My secret will die with me!
the outing of a secret agent
They made the swap in secret.
give a secret to the Russians
She revealed the secret to us.
John and Mary court in secret.
She will not reveal the secret.
Their secret signal was a wink.
He was sent on a secret mission.
I can't tell you. It's a secret.
one of nature's greatest secrets
She would not reveal the secret.
He took that secret to the grave.
I don't know the secret password.
the secret compartment in the desk
Every secret agent has a code name.
The file was labelled 'Top Secret'.
example_translate: У неё было горе о котором она никому не рассказывала.
Её тайна умерла вместе с ней.
Моя тайна умрёт вместе со мной.
Моя тайна умрёт вместе со мной!
Я не могу вам рассказать. Это секрет.
Она бы не выдала эту тайну.
Он забрал эту тайну в могилу
У каждого секретного агента есть кодовое имя.
